summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear to be addressed on /pre-meditation via a new DurationRangeInput component and purported timer centering changes, but the diff also includes unrelated modifications (notably backend/main.mo and animation behavior changes) that go beyond the requested scope (REQ-3).

hallucinated_features.description: Backend changes in backend/main.mo unrelated to restoring the pre-meditation duration input UI or centering the timer display.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is frontend-only except for the general constraint to keep changes minimal (REQ-3). No backend changes were requested for this fix.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to MeditationWaveFillIndicator animation behavior (e.g., smooth interpolation/easing and additional rendering logic) not explicitly required for timer centering or restoring duration inputs.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 is about horizontal centering of the timer ring + time text; altering fill animation smoothing is an unrelated visual/behavior change and risks violating REQ-3's scope limit.
